Services The services we offer & how we can help you!

Logistics/Product Support Management Services (PSM)

  • PSM Support of US Services, FMS and Security Cooperative activities
  • Design Interface Publications, Integration and Support Services
  • Sustaining Engineering to meet Operational/Intermediate/Depot Level activities
    • ECP/TCTD
    • Prototyping and Test
    • Technical Writing, BCA and IETMS Support
  • Supply Support of Depots, DLA and NAVSUPP WSS activities
  • Maintenance Planning and Management
    • OOMA/DECKPLATE/ILSMS
    • LCSP/LORA/Site Surveys/etc.
    • Material Procurement and Distribution, Warehousing
    • Packaging, Handling, Storage, and Transportation (PHS&T) depot expertise
  • Asset and Configuration tracking
  • Providing Technical Data across all elements of lifecycle (FMECA/CM/Risk/etc.)
  • Public-Private Partnerships

Cost and Financial Analysis/Data Analytics

  • Life Cycle Cost Estimates, Cost Modeling and Should-Cost expertise
  • Integrated Master Scheduling services
  • Risk Analysis, Probabilistic Distributions, Confidence Intervals, Sensitivity Analysis
  • Business Case Analyses (BCA)
  • Earned Value Management
  • Financial & TOC Analysis
  • Business and Financial Modeling
  • Trend Analysis and Forecasting
  • POM and Budget Formulation
  • Spend Plans
  • Navy ERP Budgeting and Financial Execution

Systems Engineering (SE)/Technology

  • Tailored SETR Planning, Systems Integration and process support
  • Requirements, WBS, Specification and Interface Document support
  • Technical Data and PIDs support
  • S/E Management, planning and IMS tracking support
  • Complex Family of systems, Systems of Systems, Sensor to Shooter support
  • S/W Management of AOP/OFP/EKB with SSA, CYBERCOM & Fleet
  • Technical and Programmatic Risk support
  • Test and Evaluation, TEMP and V&V reporting support

Program Management

  • Project Management
  • Integrated Master Schedules (IMS)
  • Critical Path Analysis
  • Risk Management
  • FMS Case Support
  • Human Resources / Staffing
  • Metrics / Performance Measures / Dashboards
  • Organizational Development and Transition
  • Instructions / SOPs / CONOPS
  • Continuous Process Improvement (CPI) / Lean Six Sigma

Logistics and Industrial Support Services

  • Fleet Support Team (FST) Integrated Product Support (IPS)/Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) services across the spectrum of IPS/ILS elements
  • Fleet Readiness Center, Southeast (FRC-SE) production line expediting and other support services
  • Kitting services for aircraft and other Department of Defense (DoD) weapons systems
  • ISO 9001/AS 9100 certified warehousing and supply chain management facility - Procurement Quality Clauses
  • International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR)-compliant Packaging Handling Storage & Transportation (PHS&T) for Foreign Military Sales (FMS) customers
  • Repair of Repairables (ROR) management, to include demand forecasting, PHS&T and Public-Private Partnership (PPP) with FRC-SE on touch labor for DoD "core" depot-level maintenance under Title 10, U.S. Code

Cybersecurity and CYBERSAFE Services

  • DFIA Aviation support
  • Incorporation of RMF guidance into engineering support:
    • DoD 8500.01 Cyber Security & DoD 8500.02 IA Program Management
    • DoD 8510.01 Risk Management Framework
    • DFIA Architecture & Vulnerability Assessment Reports (VARs)
  • Providing PPP/IA/CM Management support of RMF Guidelines
  • Cybersecurity process support:
    • Functional Decomposition & Mission Essential functions/dependencies
    • Cyber Risk Assessments (CRA) & Cyber Table Top Analysis (TTA)
    • Crown Jewel & Attack Tree/Vector analysis
    • Cyber Risk Level (CRL) determination
    • Standard Work Package (SWP) development
  • DoDAF & CUI management
  • Network Software Patch & IAV management
  • FoS and SoS Attack Tree, Enclave and CSL support
  • CYBERSAFE requests & Certification support

International Manned & Unmanned Airworthiness and CYBERSAFE Services

  • Airworthiness Certification Plans, Tailored AQP & EDRAP planning
  • Configuration Management (CCB/ECP/TCTD) support
  • Flight Clearances (PFC/IFC) & FMS support (MEFR/MFTP/RTS)
  • Type Certification Baselines (TCB) & International reciprocity
  • Public Aircraft Operations (PAO) and Commercial Aircraft Services (CAS)

  • Aviation Product Support Manager (PSM) activities
  • Support of CYBERSAFE requests & Certifications (See Cybersecurity services)
